eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{gaugepot-1}
A_1 = - 2 \pi i x_2 / (L_1 L_2) \tau_3 \, , \quad 
A_2 = 0 \, , \quad
A_3 = - 2 \pi i x_4 / (L_3 L_4) \tau_3 \, , \quad 
A_4 = 0 \, .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\partial_4 f_{n 0 l} (x_4) &=& E_{n 0 l} f_{n 0 l} (x_4) \, , \\
f_{n 0 l} (x_4) &=& 
C_{n 0 l} \exp{\left\{ 
- (-1)^{l} \pi \frac{L_4}{L_3} \left( n + \frac{x_4}{L_4}\right)^2
\right\} } \, .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\begin{array}{rclcrcl}
\displaystyle
u &=& \left( x_1 + i x_2 \right) / L_1 & , & 
u^{(0)} &=& \left( x_1^{(0)} + i x_2^{(0)} \right) / L_1 \, , \\ 
\displaystyle
v &=& \left( x_3 + i x_4 \right) / L_3 
& , & 
v^{(0)} &=& \left( x_3^{(0)} + i x_4^{(0)} \right) / L_3 \, . 
\end{array}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\psi_{n m l} &=& \left( \alpha_{n m} \tilde \phi_m
+ \beta_{n m} \tilde \phi_{-m} \right) \otimes \chi_l
\, \ff_n 
\, , \, m,n \in \Z \, , \, m \neq 0 \, , \, l=1,2 \, , \\
\psi_{n 0 l} &=& \alpha_{n 0} \tilde \phi_0 \otimes \chi_l
\, \ff_n 
\, , \, n \in \Z \, , \, l=1,2 \, ,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
U_1 = U_3 = \Id \, , \quad 
U_2 = \exp{\left( 2 \pi i  
      \left( \frac{x_1}{L_1} + \frac{x_3}{L_3} \right) \right)} 
\, , \quad 
U_4 = \exp{\left( 2 \pi i  \frac{x_3}{L_3} \right)} \, .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{gaugepot-1}
A_1 = - 2 \pi i x_2 / (L_1 L_2) \tau_3 \, , \quad 
A_2 = 0 \, , \quad
A_3 = - 2 \pi i x_4 / (L_3 L_4) \tau_3 \, , \quad 
A_4 = 0 \, .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\partial_4 f_{n 0 l} (x_4) &=& E_{n 0 l} f_{n 0 l} (x_4) \, , \\
f_{n 0 l} (x_4) &=& 
C_{n 0 l} \exp{\left\{ 
- (-1)^{l} \pi \frac{L_4}{L_3} \left( n + \frac{x_4}{L_4}\right)^2
\right\} } \, .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\begin{array}{rclcrcl}
\displaystyle
u &=& \left( x_1 + i x_2 \right) / L_1 & , & 
u^{(0)} &=& \left( x_1^{(0)} + i x_2^{(0)} \right) / L_1 \, , \\ 
\displaystyle
v &=& \left( x_3 + i x_4 \right) / L_3 
& , & 
v^{(0)} &=& \left( x_3^{(0)} + i x_4^{(0)} \right) / L_3 \, . 
\end{array}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\psi_{n m l} &=& \left( \alpha_{n m} \tilde \phi_m
+ \beta_{n m} \tilde \phi_{-m} \right) \otimes \chi_l
\, \ff_n 
\, , \, m,n \in \Z \, , \, m \neq 0 \, , \, l=1,2 \, , \\
\psi_{n 0 l} &=& \alpha_{n 0} \tilde \phi_0 \otimes \chi_l
\, \ff_n 
\, , \, n \in \Z \, , \, l=1,2 \, ,
